titles.title: JP580 May the God of hope

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
May the God of hope
Fill you with all joy and peace,
As you trust in Him,
As you trust in Him.
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So that You might overflow with hope,
By the power of the Holy Spirit.
So that You might overflow with hope,
With hope, by the power of the Holy Spirit.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Father God, I love You,
Father God, I trust You.
Father God, I need You every day.
Fill me with Your hope, Lord,
Fill me with Your joy, Lord;
Fill me with Your peace,
Let Your love flow.
